name: wamr-multi-jit
install-command: git clone https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasm-micro-runtime.git --depth 1 wamr-multi-jit && cd wamr-multi-jit/product-mini/platforms/$(uname -s | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') && ./build_llvm.sh && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. -DWAMR_BUILD_FAST_JTI=1 -DWAMR_BUILD_JIT=1 && make && mkdir -p ../../../../bin && cp iwasm ../../../../bin/iwasm
desc: WebAssembly Micro Runtime (WAMR) built with Multi-tier JIT, a two level JIT tier-up engine
update-command: cd wamr-multi-jit && git pull && rm -rf bin && cd product-mini/platforms/$(uname -s | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') && rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. -DWAMR_BUILD_FAST_JTI=1 -DWAMR_BUILD_JIT=1 && make && mkdir -p ../../../../bin && cp iwasm ../../../../bin/iwasm
